text.div:
StructureMapListMode

If field is a list, how to manage the list

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/map-list-mode defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
first First when the target list is being assembled, the items for this rule go first. If more that one rule defines a first item (for a given instance of mapping) then this is an error
share Share the target instance is shared with the target instances generated by another rule (up to the first common n items, then create new ones)
last Last when the target list is being assembled, the items for this rule go last. If more that one rule defines a last item (for a given instance of mapping) then this is an error

name: StructureMapListMode
description: If field is a list, how to manage the list

concept.definition: when the target list is being assembled, the items for this rule go first. If more that one rule defines a first item (for a given instance of mapping) then this is an error
the target instance is shared with the target instances generated by another rule (up to the first common n items, then create new ones)
when the target list is being assembled, the items for this rule go last. If more that one rule defines a last item (for a given instance of mapping) then this is an error
